website_summaries.verdict: The Soundmatters FoxL v2 Bluetooth portable speaker offers excellent sound in a compact candy-bar design and has the added benefit of phone conferencing using the built-in speakerphone. Despite its lofty price tag, the FoxL v2 is a simple, worthwhile device that lets you ditch wires and bring your music anywhere.
pros: Redesigned internal architecture improves Bluetooth audio quality compared with the first model
tough outer casing can take a beating
proprietary BassBattery delivers impressive low-end response
pairs easily with A2DP Bluetooth audio players

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I had my fingers crossed that this would sound as good as many have said it does... I looked at YouTube reviews of the unit, but you can never really tell about audio reproduction on a video. But I must say that it meets my expectations. I wanted small, but I also wanted some low end. I suspect that this is about as "low" as you can go in such a small enclosure. It is a little heavy due to it's well made solid case.
customer_reviews.author: The Travel Blogger

customer_reviews.title: So very cool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device even though it may be a bit pricy. Seems the "get what you pay for adage" applies here. It is surprisingly small, but the sound is amazing considering size. The Bluetooth hooked up without any fuss to my iPad and iPhone. The microphone part of the speaker phone function isn't the best, but that's not what I bought it for. I have only had it for a few days, but if it holds up to everyday use, then it will rank right up there with my iPad as one of my favorite things.
customer_reviews.author: Fly

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a lot of money on small speakers & none have done what I wanted. Found these & took the plunge. Absolutely impressed. Everything I was looking for in a small wireless speaker. Best of all the sound quality is incredible. As stated in other reviews you better be careful as it will walk off a smooth surface & you don't want it to fall. Quit wasting your money & just by this speaker. One note, the range is not as great as my LG headphones but aren't you going to be in the same room as the speaker anyway?
customer_reviews.author: Akparkflyers

customer_reviews.title: Very good speakers for iPad
customer_reviews.text: This review will be short as others have commented extensively on these speakers. While a little expensive, they are perfect for me. Quality of sound is good and speakers can be quite loud. Portability is excellent. I use my iPad outside when exercising and these speakers are just what I wanted. The design is good and the speakers paired up (Bluetooth) immediately. Very easy to operate. So I would recommend if you are willing to spend the money.
customer_reviews.author: georgehd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound in a small package.
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker completely delivers. Great sound. Great battery life. Plug in or hook up with Bluetooth. I can't really compare it to anything because it's my first compact speaker. But I really love it. P.S. I've hooked it up to an iPod Touch via Bluetooth, an Android phone via Bluetooth and several iPods via the cable that's included. I even hooked it up as a mini "sound bar" on my HDTV. All worked great. However, when I tried to play music from my MacBook Pro using iTunes (via Bluetooth) the sound quality was unacceptable. I have to believe this is a problem with the drivers in the MacBook Pro... NOT the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Healy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price..
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I'd have been happy paying full price ($249) for this, but quite happy now that it is highly discounted on Amazon. Love the compact size for storage and travel. Battery life is great. Easy to synch with iPhone/iPad etc. Sounds is as you'd expect based on the size of the speakers. Bass is not the greatest. Build quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: VellsMaster

customer_reviews.title: Pricy, and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: As a music-loving road-warrior, I have purchased many different portable speaker solutions over the years. The FoxLv2 is simply the best. The sound is clear and accurate. Volume is more that adequate for hotel room listening, and the small weight/size makes it easy to keep in the smallest of travel bags. Bluetooth works fine, but can be 'buzzy', a direct cord yields best results. Cell phone function isn't so hot though, and the call audio level and quality pales to the music function, hence 4 not 5 stars. Still, if portablility and audio quality are your criteria, you will not regret this purchase. Sam Missimer
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Missimer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth connection to my IPad was easy. I have an Iphone too. The sound is crystal clear for classical and modern music. It's great for audio books in the car. It fits in my pocket. I can listen in any room. I love it. I read all the reviews first and I bought the right product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle Installation foxLv2 Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Installed the foxLv2 Bluetooth speaker system (with separate OEM bike attachment kit) on the handlebars of my 2009 Kawasaki Vulcan 500 LTD motorcycle this weekend... paired with my iPhone... enjoyed streaming audio and one-button answer on phone calls... volume is loud enough to be heard over engine noise... callers report only minor wind noise during phone calls... works great... superb product... highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: cdguess2

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally good speakers
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It has a very long lasting battery, and the sound is really much better than I could have hoped for with such a small speaker. Furthermore, it proves itself very reliable. I am using it for over a year already, and it works very well - BT connection is reliable (it connects right away when I turn them on), it even fell a couple of times and nothing happened to it thanks to the rugged corpse. Bottom line: highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Yevgeny Safovich

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best in it's class
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say more than what already said. Size, audio quality, bass. I echo all positives reviews. This unit is pure awesomeness. Finally a speaker worth taking for travel. Who thought it will even fit in jeans pocket! It runs 5 hours on battery which is pretty good. But if you need more battery life pair if with any usb based portable battery (I use this one:which also serves as fast charger)
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great bike+travel speakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my brother as a gift. He primarily wanted them for his bike but he does a lot of international travel and enjoys pairing the speaker to his iPad and watching a movie on his iPad (or tunes). He said, "These speaker's rock!" So I have to take his word on it. I bought him the bike mount too. He said it mounted easily and looked great too. Only problem is you have to take the speaker with you. The mount just grips the speakers, no bolting so anybody could just grab them and go if left unintended.
customer_reviews.author: RyanMiller

customer_reviews.title: To the attendant at the time of the business trip
customer_reviews.text: The Music sound that is splendid though it is a compact style. Beautyful Good design. I can enjoy a good sound easily in hotels of the business trip. This output sound power is satisfied with this littleness. I am satisfied with the specifications of the few speaker very much in other Manufactures. Sometime, Bluetooth Radio wave is slight disconnection, but is not worried about the use frequency. Because it is usualy use is cableconect.
customer_reviews.author: Sheeya

customer_reviews.title: Mighty impressed
customer_reviews.text: It does seem (at first) a tad pricey. Because it's small and because travel speakers are "supposed" to cost, like, $50. However, the sound quality per square inch is amazing. The expert reviews that led me to this speaker are correct. It's so easy to toss this in your bag for a trip or take it to a barbecue or listen to music around the house. The bass is respectable for the size and the Bluetooth connection is pretty darn solid. I even misplaced the power adapter and customer service helped resolve that issue quickly and inexpensively. Thats all, folks- highly recommended if you have the cash and need a portable, quality speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the Bose Mini, same price, but VERY GOOD and not locked into BlueTooth.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Showker

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to add after all the glowing comments. It was smaller than it looked online... a great thing. Sounds great anywhere... super portable. If the moeny is in the budget this is a no brainer if you want to share music in a setting where a large system is not possible. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: PCGold

customer_reviews.title: Quite expensive but great sound quality for its size
customer_reviews.text: Having owned and tested quite a number of small speakers, this is by far the best sounding of the lot, hence the high price. You gotta judge this in the category of small speakers. Don't expect it to sound remotely close to a speaker with 5inch diameter speakers or PC subwoofers, cos it doesn't have any! But if you look at it as the mini speaker that it is, you'll be impressed. I can't wait to add in the subwoofer Soundmatters have revealed some time back.
customer_reviews.author: S. Yeong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sturdy blue-tooth sound system and I found it in these speakers. Build quality is impeccable and they sound great for small speakers. Battery life is great...I've used them at work for 3 days on and off without having to recharge which well exceeds the 5 hour battery life clam. Bottom line...the price is justified.
customer_reviews.author: Will Stimpson

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many stereo bluetooth speakers and this one wowed me! The size (so small), the build quality (feels heavy duty) and most importantly the audio quality! All predecessors are returned or for sale...The FoxLv2 is the one for me!
customer_reviews.author: Myron Thornberry

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and size. Built well. Just wish I could walk my phone further away before the Bluetooth cuts out. The range is less than 20 feet. Not sure if it's my phone or the speakers. Otherwise awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: chad g.

customer_reviews.title: Soundmatters Bluetooth Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Did alot of checking before ordering this particular speakers. Bought these as a xmas present and my son loves them. Because there blue tooth he carries them from room to room. They sound like a full size stero. I also purchased the travel trunk Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joeri Desira

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound for a small package
customer_reviews.text: The Soundmatters flxLv2 is a solid piece of equipment that definitely belongs in your travel bag. Sound from this unit is amazing and using it with iTunes or when making a presentation with sound is a must. Used it at a friends wedding to show a DVD video slide show of the bride and groom growing up and thru their years together prior to the wedding. Sound easily and richly passed thru the room of guests. Several came up later to ask where the speakers were and when I picked up the flxLv2 to show them, they were very impressed. Worth the money, at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: konagt

customer_reviews.title: Best compact rechargeble speaker available
customer_reviews.text: This item lives up to its reputation as the best Bluetooth mini rechargeable speaker. Everyone who hears it is amazed at the quality and power. I use it as my powered speaker connected to my laptop and out playing disc golf. It fills up a 12X14 room with music and it provides crystal clear tunes when I am outside throwing discs. Quality is excellent on both Bluetooth and cable. I could not be happier, I use this device for hours almost everyday and after almost a month I am still astounded at the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Pawnee

customer_reviews.title: Voice is very unclear like it has extra bass in everything and I'm listening to it underwater
customer_reviews.text: I can't compare it to any small cheap speakers and feel impressed. I'm currently using Bose Mini and it blow this one out of the water big time.
customer_reviews.author: Leena P.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a good-sounding speaker system!
customer_reviews.text: Solid. all-metal construction. Easily pairs with Macbook, iPad, iPhone, and iPod (with a BT transmitter) The sound is great! A bit pricey, but worth it if you are looking for good, wireless sound.
customer_reviews.author: Yetchtoo

customer_reviews.title: the most musical speaker
customer_reviews.text: After testing many candidates, I found plenty of choices: sound more louder, more powerful, more crystalline, etc ... but in the end none as fair and a close balance of headphones this little Foxl. It has balance and that is the most musical sound. His only fault is not to be very powerful and sometimes saturate following songs at high volume. But for the rest, it is ideal!
customer_reviews.author: Hardy Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: While ot worked as advertised. It doesn't produce volume any louder than a laptop. The output cuts in and out in a quiet room.
customer_reviews.author: MrVideo

customer_reviews.title: Crazy good!
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine last week, and, just, wow. It's every bit as good as advertised, and now its' my travel speaker of choice. I used to bring along my Tivoli iPAL (which I still love to death), but the foxl is its equal and better in many ways (Bluetooth being among those ways.) AND now I can pack another shirt with the space I've saved. :) I'm taking this bad boy to Italy in the fall - can't wait!!!
customer_reviews.author: HifiGuy

customer_reviews.title: Cool Bluetooth portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: I really like this FOXL blue tooth speaker. Small and compact. Easy to transport. Decent sound. Use it a lot with iPhone and iPad to play iTunes, Pandora, and other music APPS. I bought one for my nephew for his birthday as well!
customer_reviews.author: S Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from something so small- Wow
customer_reviews.text: The FoxL bluetooth unit is phenomenal to put i simply. It is a well constructed portable loudspeaker that does exactly what it is advertised to do. It paired without a problem with my iPhone 4S, and my iPad3. Sound quality is excellent. Not tinny or buzzy. I would also mention this comes packaged with all the cables, power plug-adapters that you should need. This is not a wanna-be-excuse-for a product as many non-mainstream brands are.
customer_reviews.author: ASG

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound, Hate the Pairing
customer_reviews.text: I love the speaker, and the sound it produce it truly amazing. Unfortunately the pairing issue for me, was totally unacceptable. Every time, I tried to use it, it went through the pairing procedures which in other speakers, I own (Bose), is so easy, but on this one, it is very very difficult, and complicated. Compare to my BOSE (Which I only paired it once with my laptop, Ipad, Iphone, Etc, this one would not remember these devices, and every time, you have to go through the pairing process). What a shame since the sound is magnificent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with Great Service
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic little speaker with a rich full sound and the right size for travelling. Not only are they a great product but sound matters provides great customer service. When I opened the box I was missing a part. I contacted sound matters via the web and Jim had the part in the mail the next day free of charge. Customer support doesn't get any better than that!
customer_reviews.author: Corby G. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound in a small box
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something to use while sitting outside on our deck. The FoxLv2 fits the bill. Nice sound with plenty of volume.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars enough. I thing you can get same sound with 70 bugs range speakers
customer_reviews.author: Materials Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Pocket Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!!! We take it to the beach and we love it! It is small enough to carry in my purse. We use it with our iPhone and iPad and it works amazingly with both!
customer_reviews.author: Myrna G

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker - who needs the newest generation
customer_reviews.text: For less than 1/2 the price of the current generation of Soundmatters speakers, this little speaker has incredible sound, good connectivity and fantastic bass!
customer_reviews.author: S. Ohm

customer_reviews.title: big things come in small packages
customer_reviews.text: This little gem is all it's cracked up to be. Unbelievable sound reproduction, volume and bass response for such a small unit. If you're a gadget freak like me, this unit is a must have. Your friends will be totally wowed when you play your favorite tunes for them on the patio. Don't forget to use the friction bass pad. The speakers will walk around while you rock out if you dont.
customer_reviews.author: jwall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound but,  beware.
customer_reviews.text: If you want this for a party or the beach, this is not for you, buy a bigger one, but if you want the best PORTABLE speaker in the market buy soundmatters.
customer_reviews.author: camaven

customer_reviews.title: Big sound, small packabe
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this item. Great sound, excellent construction, easy pairing. A little sensitive as to the range with respect to the bluetooth. Much over 20 feet can cause some drop-out. Otherwise, excellent. Make sure you use the small pad, or it will vibrate off the table with so much bass.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Stone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and volume for the size
customer_reviews.text: Just unpacked this little powerhouse and after charging it to full (as specified in the directions) I am amazed and pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed user
customer_reviews.text: I primairly use this speaker for presentation in training classes. It is compact, light weight, well constructed, and very easy to plug and play and has the power and volume to fill a fairly good size room. I intend to pruchase the subwolfer to go along with it to complete the sound package. You won't be disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little system
customer_reviews.text: The Foxl speaker system is awesome. I use it on my golf cart mounted to the dash. Starts up quickly with my iPhone through bluetooth and lasts the full round and more. I lost a part and the company sent me one the next day. Very pleased with the system and support.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Bergmann

customer_reviews.title: It made my day I would say hey hey hey
customer_reviews.text: there are not enough stars in the universe to rate this item!!! Now let me go so I can enjoy some dope bass kicking beats y'all!!!
customer_reviews.author: suki warrior

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I never dreamt that such a small package could pack such a huge sound and an amazing quality and clarity of sound to.. Recommend this to anyone and this now travels with me everywhere. FANTASTIC & AMAZING wish I could be more inventive and say more about it....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overrated!
customer_reviews.text: I was swayed by positive and glowing reviews and high ratings for this product and so I bought one.... I am so very disappointed! Tiny sound coming from a tiny speaker with the sound getting easily distorted as volume is turned up! Sure It is tiny and compact and looks very well built but if you are buying for the sound and not for the sight (I agree it's cute and tiny), I won't recommend this speaker for you.....
customer_reviews.author: curlyNoodles

customer_reviews.title: Very Elegant Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for such a little loudspeaker. Very natural display of all kinds of music. I think the old old version is a good compromise between Quality and Price.
customer_reviews.author: mahzih

customer_reviews.title: Truely Amazing Small Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I considered this is the small speaker which could produce such great and amazing sound. I really love it. Good job.
customer_reviews.author: Lim Tze Siong

customer_reviews.title: Poor , very Poor
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this foxl unit after reading a number of good reviews.....It took me about an hour to decide to pack it up and send it back. Poor base, poor volume and really tin like sound. I ended up getting the SuperTooth and man it just blows away this Foxl in quality and sound. Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere than the Foxl.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leaird

customer_reviews.title: Old Version is good for me and C/P is high.
customer_reviews.text: I like Soundmatters foxLv2 Bluetooth Loudspeaker System but too expensive, the Old Version is good for me and very cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Jih Jeng Lu

customer_reviews.title: VERY Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I got really hyped up about this product on how great it was and how amazing the bass response was on this speaker system. I can't believe I wasted my money. returning ASAP! SOUNDFREAQ SFQ-04 gets SO much louder and has way better bass response. Granted the Soundmatters speakers is really small. The SFQ-04 is about 3-4 times as big, about $100 bucks here (MORE than twice as less as the soundmatters). Anything with even a little bass sounds absolutely horrid. You can try it if you want and maybe the system i got was just a fluke. but still.. if a "rocket scientist" made it, shouldn't it be worth it? Not for me it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Henry

customer_reviews.title: Soundmatters foxLv2 Bluetooth Loudspeaker System (Black)
customer_reviews.text: Superb. It's a must buy item if you can spare the money. Wonderfully portable (it will fit into a man's pocket and lady's handbag with ease)
customer_reviews.author: Graham Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit. Looks great, sounds, great, Bluetooth works great. It's a bit heavy to hang around your neck as it suggests. Perfect for travel or small office / room personal speaker. Is pricey but you are getting what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The loudspeaker is incredible and I received it right away¡
customer_reviews.author: Belem

customer_reviews.title: Qualité dans un très petit format
customer_reviews.text: Produit d'apparence d'une grande qualité.Le prix est très correct lorsque comparé avec d'autre produits offrant les mêmes performances. Parfait pour les ipod car on est certain qu'il n'y a pas de problèmes de compatibilté avec les différentes générations comme pour certains autres modèles d'haut-parleurs. On apprécie ce produit pour le format vs l'excellent son qu'il produit. Il pourrait y avoir plus de basse mais compte tenu du format, je trouve cela quand même excellent. J'adore le produit.
customer_reviews.author: marquis

customer_reviews.title: FoxL
customer_reviews.text: Fine sound for its size . . . I'm running it off my iPhone and signal holds up out to 20 feet or so. Volume is fine even on battery power.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Al

customer_reviews.title: SMALL BUT POWERFUL
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is tiny but the sound is so good and powerful. Very sturdy built, worth the $213 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: THE SHUFFLER

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an small speaker for double duty. I hard wire to my laptop and bluetooth for my smartphone. Sound is excellent and small size makes it convenient. Dropped it to the cement floor in my garage this week and it didn't even dent.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Dethloff

customer_reviews.title: what he said
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my dad and he sent it back saying it didn't have enough sound for what he wanted. He was trying to use it in a 3 car garage usually with 2 or all 3 of the garage doors open. So if you have a space like that, this speaker may not cut it. A friend has one and it seemed fine in an indoor living space.
customer_reviews.author: James Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Mostly pleased.
customer_reviews.text: My husband requested this item, so I surprised him for his birthday. Smaller than expected, and has lived up to expectations, based on other reviews and product description.
customer_reviews.author: Yamurphy

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality. Good sound.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the audio performance. Don't expect miracles but very good sound quality for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Do not waist your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the beats pill and then saw this product and read the positive reviews. Based on the reviews I Thought for sure I would be returning the pill. I got the foxL a few days ago and couldn't get it back in the mail for a return soon enough!! The bass is horrible and when you have the volume turned up its worst than your phone or tablet speakers. Do not waist your time or money on this like I did
customer_reviews.author: Rw284

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived DOA and customer support to get a refund nonexistent
customer_reviews.text: It was bad enough to pay for a product that doesn't work right out of the box (probably known not to work when it was shipped). Then to get the run around when I applied for a refund. I have had to resort to contacting my credit card company to attempt to contest the charge. My efforts to ask Amazon to help have also fallen on deaf ears. All in all I'm truly dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Joeey

product_meta.title: Soundmatters foxLv2 Bluetooth Loudspeaker System (Black) (Old Version)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingSoundmatters introduces foxLv2 and foxLv2 Bluetooth, worthy successors to the first and still only portable pocket-sized stereo speaker system good enough for an audio purist. The foxLv2 Bluetooth version adds significantly improved Bluetooth music streaming (great for use with iPhone 3G/3GS/touch and other music phones) and surprisingly competent built-in dual-microphone system for “enterprise-quality” hands-free/conferencing.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



Soundmatters introduces foxLv2 and foxLv2 Bluetooth, worthy successors to the first and still only portable pocket-sized stereo speaker system good enough for an audio purist. The foxLv2 Bluetooth version adds significantly improved Bluetooth music streaming (great for use with iPhone 3G/3GS/touch and other music phones) and surprisingly competent built-in dual-microphone system for "enterprise-quality" hands-free/conferencing.



Turns the palm of your hand into a personal amphitheater

LINEAR MAGNETIC DRIVE TWOOFER
Unlike other portable speaker systems, foxLv2 is engineered around a pair of proprietary, highly sophisticated acoustic drivers, unique in their ability to reproduce both extreme high (tweeter) and low (woofer) frequencies from a single very small diameter (25mm) dome speaker, dubbed the "Twoofer".

Covered by a portfolio of patents, the Twoofer incorporates Soundmatter's Linear Magnetic Drive topology featuring field-focused, back-to-back, dual Extreme-Energy neodymium magnets and a 1-inch, dual voice coil.

ENHANCED BLUETOOTH HANDS-FREE AND MUSIC STREAMING
Soundmatters engineers worked closely with their factory partner, one of the largest manufacturers of Bluetooth devices, to ensure that foxLv2's implementation of Bluetooth's v.2.0 A2DP (Advanced Audio Distribution Profile) technology was optimized for both wide audio bandwidth and low distortion. This extra effort ensures surprisingly high quality stereo music streaming.



Bring and share the joy of high-fidelity music anywhere

foxLv2's built-in noise and echo-canceling microphone circuitry, coupled with the Twoofer's remarkable voice clarity, make it a superb choice for hands-free and conference call applications. When a call comes in while listening to music streamed via a Bluetooth-enabled music phone, foxLv2 automatically switches so you'll hear and be able to speak to the caller, and when the call is finished music returns. With a quick press of foxLv2's front Bluetooth button, you can even remotely reject, answer, or terminate a call.

"SKINTIGHT" DOMEFORWARD ENCLOSURE
foxLv2 incorporates high-tech glass-filled composite walls to form a "skintight" ultra-rigid totally sealed acoustic enclosure...often confused with metal, but much lighter, for portability.

Unlike others that mount their acoustic drivers in manner that actually obstructs their sound, especially if the listener is off-axis from the front of the speakers' direct "line of sight," foxLv2’s Twoofer speakers, are mounted "dome forward" from the enclosure, protected by a grille designed to maximize acoustic transparency. Another reason why unlike typical small speakers, foxLv2 sounds open and airy, almost regardless of its location.

BASSBATTERY/FLATMAGIC
foxLv2's dual digitally powered Twoofers are assisted in their task of reproducing low frequencies by a miniaturized version of the high mass "moving-wall" passive bass radiators found in Soundmatters' award-winning SUBstage home subwoofers.

To add the additional bass driver, without compromising stringent weight and space restrictions, Soundmatters engineers developed an innovative solution: the BassBattery. This patent-pending design was created by rubber-encasing foxLv2's built-in high capacity, lithium-ion battery, enabling it to provide the mass for, and doing double duty as an acoustic suspension bass driver.
feature_bullets: Now with improved auto-connect Bluetooth stereo- wireless sounds amazing via iPhone 3G/3Gs/Touch, Blackberry, etc
Enhanced Business-Quality Bluetooth Hands-Free capability utilizing dual noise/echo canceling mics
Built-in Lithium-Ion battery amazingly is also a bass woofer (patented), up to 12 hours of battery life. Output power increases when wall-powered.
Wireless A2DP Bluetooth music streaming/handsfree speakerphone. Wired connections include: standard 3.5 mm headphone-type connector audio-in
Includes: English/French language instructions, AC adapter with 4 plug-in adapters, mini-USB>USB cable, 3.5mm audio cable, travel pouch,
